encyclopedia.content: 美国牛津词典词条： Technicolor: noun trademark a process of color cinematography using synchronized monochrome films, each of a different color, to produce a movie in color. Technicolor集团： Technicolor 特艺集团(以下简称Technicolor )在娱乐创新行业有超过 95 年的丰富经验，服务于全球各地的娱乐、软件和游戏客户。公司是面向内容创建商、网络服务提供商和广播公司的领先的制作、后期制作及发行服务提供商。 Te

entry.def: Technicolor is a system of colour photography used in making cinema films.

entry.tran: （尤用作夸张）五彩缤纷，色彩斑斓
entry.def: You can use technicolor to describe real or imagined scenes when you want to emphasize that they are very colourful, especially in an exaggerated way.

example.ex: I was seeing it all in glorious technicolour: mountains, valleys, lakes, summer sunshine.
example.tran: 我所看见的一切——大山、山谷、湖泊和夏日的阳光全都绚丽多彩。

means.word_mean: 1. a trademarked method of making color motion pictures
